trans-unit.source: Represents one or more cubic Bezier curves.
trans-unit.target: 表示一條或多條三次方貝茲曲線。

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> object to store <xref:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment> objects and other segments.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>儲存物件<xref:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment>物件和其他區段。

trans-unit.source: A cubic Bezier curve is defined by four points: a start point, an end point and two control points.
trans-unit.target: 三次方貝茲曲線由四個點所定義： 起點、 結束點和兩個控制點。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment> specifies one or more cubic Bezier curves by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment.Points%2A> property to a collection of points.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment>藉由設定指定一或多個三次方貝茲曲線<xref:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment.Points%2A>的點集合的屬性。

trans-unit.source: For every three points in the collection, the first and second points specify the two control points of the curve and the third point specifies the end point.
trans-unit.target: 針對每個集合中的三個點，第一個和第二個點指定曲線的兩個控制點，然後第三個點指定的結束點。

trans-unit.source: Note that no start point for the curve is specified because start point is the same as the end point of the last segment.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，因為起始點的最後一個區段的結束點相同，確認已指定沒有曲線開始點。

trans-unit.source: The two control points of a cubic Bezier curve behave like magnets, attracting portions of what would otherwise be a straight line toward themselves and producing a curve.
trans-unit.target: 兩個控制點三次方貝茲曲線的行為與磁鐵吸引部份功能原本是直線和曲線。

trans-unit.source: The first control point affects the beginning portion of the curve; the second control point affects the ending portion of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 第一個控制點影響的開頭部分的曲線。第二個控制點會影響曲線的結束部分。

trans-unit.source: Note that the curve doesn't necessarily pass through either of the control points; each control point moves its portion of the line toward itself, but not through itself.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，曲線不一定通過其中一個控制點。每個控制點會移動它的部分向本身，但不是能透過本身的行。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment> to draw two cubic Bezier curves.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment>繪製兩個三次方貝茲曲線。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The collection of points that specify the geometry of the cubic Bezier curve segments.
trans-unit.target: 點集合，這些點指定三次方貝茲曲線線段的幾何。

trans-unit.source: Value specifying whether the segments are stroked.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否描繪線段的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment" /> class with the specified collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> objects and a value specifying whether the segments are stroked.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment" /> 類別的新執行個體，這個執行個體具有指定之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> 物件的集合，以及指定是否將片段描邊的值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment" /> 的可修改複製品，深層複製這個物件的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true." />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment" /> 物件的可修改複製品，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、資料繫結和動畫，但是會複製其目前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="false" />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" /> that define this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" />，它會定義這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Collection that define this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 定義這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment.Points%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment> that defines two cubic Bezier curves.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment.Points%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment>，定義兩個三次方貝茲曲線。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment.Points" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment.Points" /> 相依性屬性。
